alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 9:24PM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected after midnight tonight and continuing through Tuesday. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph with some blowing snow. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Greeley, Sterling, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
